label: A3B_hP24_165_adg_f-001
title: H$_{3}$Ho Structure
comments:
This structure is crystallographically equivalent to \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B_hP24_165_bdg_f-001}{Cu$_{3}$P ($D0_{21}$)}. We retain it as the prototype for the subclass of this prototype containing hydrogen. 
 The data was taken for the deuteride, D$_{3}$Ho.
